Time Remaining:

Quiz Guidelines:

  • Familiarize yourself with the quiz instructions and layout before starting.
  • Multiple-choice questions usually have one correct answer, so choose the most appropriate option.
  • Avoid guessing answers without considering the provided options carefully.
  • Review your answers before submitting the quiz to ensure accuracy.

Time Management:

  • The quiz may have a time limit, so manage your time wisely.
  • Monitor the remaining time periodically to gauge your progress and allocate time accordingly.

Academic Integrity:

  • The quiz is a test of your knowledge and understanding, so attempt it independently.
  • Do not seek external help or refer to unauthorized materials during the quiz.
  • Plagiarism or cheating will lead to disciplinary actions as per the institution's policies.

Submission:

  • Click on the "Start" button only when you are ready to begin the quiz.
  • Once the quiz starts, do not refresh the page or navigate away from the quiz interface.
  • Submit your quiz before the designated deadline or when the time limit expires.
